description: Temple Tech is an active baselayer designed for multisport use. It is lightweight, has a slim fit and is packed with features to deliver performance in all conditions. Temple Tech uses ultra-lite Merino Air-Con 140. Nature's climate control - It keeps you cool when you're hot, warm when its not.
name: Mons Royale Temple Tech Hood - Mens

specs.value: Merino Air-Con - 83% Merino Wool 13% Nylon 4% Elastane, 140 gsm
